english.segment1: I woke her up cause I could barely sleep, At 2AM and contemplating faith. I made my way right out her door. The street lights, shine bright. I run away while she sleeps thorugh the night.
english.segment2: [Chorus]. Was it fate that brought us here. My mistakes I made in fear. Is it too late to change my mind?. Who have I been?
english.segment3: Stepping back to where I used to be, Incomplete and helpless so it seems. The fog's like a wall, And it's hard to see. It's feelings' meanings. I start my car and drive 'til I found peace.
english.segment5: Who have I been?. When will this end. Time's running thin. Figure it out. Figure it out
english.segment7: Who have I been?. When will this end. Time's running thin. Figure it out. Figure it out.
